channel.title: Zen and the Art of Blog Maintenance
channel.description: Recent content on Zen and the Art of Blog Maintenance

item.title: My Setup
item.description: I’m always interested in the tools that experts in a given domain use day-to-day. I am by no means an expert, but would love to learn about new tools that I haven’t tried. Sidenote: I work from home. If you’ve got a good suggestion, please reach out! Mobile mode Coffee shops, when I go down to the office, etc Apple MacBook Pro (Retina, 15”, mid-2015) 16 GB RAM Core i7 @ 2.
